title: 05/05/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 05/05/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP and the guys discuss Jimmy G's willingness to mentor Trey Lance. Is that something he had to just say to the media? We're joined by Matt Miller, ESPN NFL Draft Contributor, to look ahead to the 2022 NFL Draft. Could we see a record 6 QBs taken in the first round? And last Yankees Play by play announcer Michael Kay calls in to recap the Astros visit to Yankee Stadium last night, their first since the cheating scandal and fans being back in attendance.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
